Life Bind.NAME: Life Bind
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you lose health, enemies with #yLife #yBind will also take damage.
Takes damage whenever you lose health.

Reflection.NAME: Reflection
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you gain #yVulnerable or #yWeakened, it is also applied to the enemy that sent it.
